name: Shop-A-Trollic
description:
Shop-A-Trollic is a game all about collecting shopping trollies and bringing them back to the trolley bay, all while under the stress of a 2 minute timer.

Expertly dodge moving vehicles as you weave your way around the car park, joining together long ropes of trollies, but don't let the customers take them!

Controls:

WASD for movement

Mouse for looking direction

Space to hold Shopping Trollies (You can only connect them up from the back!)

Credits:

- Art

  • Dan Cain (@DanCainArt)
  • Pieter Pauwels (@_Pietson)

- Code

  • Chris Youles (@NiceNChrispy)
  • David Greedy (@DavidGreedy)

- Music

Happy Happy Game Show by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3856-happy-happy-game-show
